name: Outward Bound
description:
Pick up the Items on your List (press N to check), and try to escape the grocery store,

if you make it out, you win. 

Unfinished, but a try at a horror game, (failed to add many sounds, and to fix bugs)

Controls:

Press N   - for Notebook

leftclick - to interact

wasd - movement
